trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow that executes activities sequentially.
trans-unit.target: Representa um fluxo de trabalho que executa atividades sequencialmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> with `Initialized` and `Completed` events for optional processing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> com `Initialized` e `Completed` eventos para processamento opcional de parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: This makes it particularly useful as a top-level activity when you design sequential-style workflows.
trans-unit.target: Isso torna particularmente útil como uma atividade de nível superior ao criar fluxos de trabalho de estilo sequencial.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> pode conter outras atividades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow has finished.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho foi concluído.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> class, and set the event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como criar um novo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> classe e definir o manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed> evento.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Policy SDK Sample from the DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do SDK política de exemplo do arquivo DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Advanced Policy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [política avançada](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que destina-se ao evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> in which dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> em que as atualizações dinâmicas podem ser feitas no fluxo de trabalho, quando substituído em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> que identifica quando podem ser feitas atualizações dinâmicas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Runs the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Executa o fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> at the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> at the end of the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> no final da operação solicitada.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho é inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que destina-se ao evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="executionContext" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).
